page.title: 17Clevedon Place_names 1
page.content: Several children reported that they lived in places with names relating to trees. Rebecca Lodge lives in Birch Avenue. "Close to my road are Ash Grove, Chestnut Grove and Rippleside Road. All these names suggest that there was a small wood growing nearby." Michelle Frake lives in "Woodcroft", Nicola Gay's road is"The Copse".Sarah Webster lives in "Woodland Glade",and Sarah Down in CrabTree Park. Justine Ormandy's home "usedto be the garden belonging to my next door neighbours.It is called Bramble Bank, because there are lots of brambles out the back and there is also a bank where brambles hang down". Anna Kearley lives near four Edward Roads!They are Edward Road North, South,East and West.Once called Queens Road ,they were renamed in 1920.
